title: Serverless Framework Configuration
description: Schema for serverless framework configuration files

oneOf.$comment: You can use the AWS::Include transform anywhere within the AWS CloudFormation template except in the template parameters section or the template version field. For example, you can use AWS::Include in the mappings section.

Location.$comment: The location is an Amazon S3 URI, with a specific file name in an S3 bucket. For example, s3://MyBucketName/MyFile.yaml.

oneOf.$comment: Use a transform to simplify template authoring for serverless applications.

binaryMediaTypes.description: Optional binary media types the API might return

disableDefaultEndpoint.description: Disable the default 'execute-api' HTTP endpoint (default: false)

enabled.description: Can be used to disable the API key without removing it (default: true)

shouldStartNameWithService.description: Use `${service}-${stage}` naming for API Gateway. Will be `true` by default in v3.

command.description: Sometimes it appears that command from the dockerfile is not read and we have to overwrite it manually to make it work. One of my clients faced this recently

entryPoint.description: Sometimes it appears that { from the dockerfile is not read and we have to overwrite it manually to make it work

AwsDeploymentBucket.description: Configure the S3 bucket used by Serverless Framework to deploy code packages to Lambda

blockPublicAccess.description: Prevents public access via ACLs or bucket policies (default: false). Note: the deployment bucket is not public by default. These are additional ACLs.

maxPreviousDeploymentArtifacts.description: On deployment, serverless prunes artifacts older than this limit (default: 5)

name.description: Name of an existing bucket to use (default: created by serverless)

skipPolicySetup.description: Skip the creation of a default bucket policy when the deployment bucket is created (default: false)

AwsEventBridge.title: AwsEventBridge
AwsEventBridge.description: Aws Lambda function Eventbridge event source

arn.description: The arn of the cognito user pool

identitySource.description: The identity source for which authorization is requested. The value is a comma-separated string of one or more mapping expressions of the specified request parameters. For example, if an Auth header, a Name query string parameter are defined as identity sources, this value is method.request.header.Auth, method.request.querystring.Name

anyOf.title: AwsHttpExistingAuthorizer
anyOf.description: Use an existing Api Gateway Authorizer created outside or in the same stack

authorizerId.description: The Id of the existing authorizer

allowedAccounts.description: **Uncommenting this will give all AWS users access to this layer unconditionally.**

retain.description: If true, layer versions are not deleted as new ones are created

AwsLayers.description: Configuration to deploy layers using serverless framework, https://www.serverless.com/framework/docs/providers/aws/guide/layers

anyOf.title: AwsPackageExcludeInclude
anyOf.description: @deprecated Please move to patterns as quickly as possible

AwsSupportedArchitecture.description: Processor architecture: 'x86_64' or 'arm64' via Graviton2 (default: x86_64)

scanOnPush.description: Enabling this will make AWS scan image for CVE(Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures)

uri.description: URI of an existing Docker image in ECR

path.description: Path to the Docker context that will be used when building that image locally (default: '.')

file.description: Dockerfile that will be used when building the image locally (default: 'Dockerfile')

apiName.description: Change this to use a custom name for the API Gateway API

oneOf.description: Note: API Gateway has a maximum timeout of 30 seconds

deploymentMethod.description: Method used for CloudFormation deployments: 'changesets' or 'direct' (default: changesets). See https://www.serverless.com/framework/docs/providers/aws/guide/deploying#deployment-method

disableRollback.description: Disable automatic rollback by CloudFormation on failure. To be used for non-production environments.

oneOf.description: This will create a new bucket and trigger the lambda when an object is added or modified inside the bucket. More details :- https://www.serverless.com/framework/docs/providers/aws/events/s3#simple-event-definition

AwsService.description: **Deprecated and doesn't work in serverless framework v3**

format.description: Log format to use for access logs. Ref:- https://docs.aws.amazon.com/apigateway/latest/developerguide/websocket-api-logging.html

fullExecutionData.description: Log full requests/responses for execution logging (default: true)

localPath.description: The path to the local .js file that contains the plugin
